creator: futung.cheng@yahoo.com
text:
Typo at <here> tags

Build the commons-logging additional component using the extras.xml Ant build script which is part of <here>teh</here> Tomcat source bundle.

Grammer at <here> tags

Tomcat 6 <here>uses defines</here> loggers by Engine and Host names.
Thanks for the report. These have been fixed in trunk and 6.0.x and will be included in 6.0.19 onwards.
creator: markt@apache.org
